name: Transcription Tools By GMR Transcription
overview: GMR Transcription Services Inc., was founded in the year 2004 to provide affordable and accurate transcription and translation services for various groups including writers,students/professors and businesses. The company is also providing its transcription services to the government institutions, non-profit organizations and medical organizations. For a better and an accurate performance GMR Transcription is providing a variety of products which can help the skilled and experienced transcriptionists to perform well. These carts are provided at an accurate and affordable rate.
